briefTitle: Demographic , Clinicopathological Characteristics and Survival of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Demographic, Clinicopathological Characteristics and Survival of Breast Cancer Patients in Assiut University Hospital (2015-2019).
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The survival rate of breast cancer in assiut university hospital
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All histologically confirmed and documented patients with invasive ductal or lobular carcinoma of the breast attending at Assiut University hospital from year 2015 to 2019.

Exclusion Criteria:

* • Patients who previously received treatment outside Assiut University hospital.

  * A serious un controlled concomitant disease that would contraindicate with use of systemic treatment. .
